S04n482:1: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayāmāsa-bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairyadāsīt |
S04n482:2: tena kālena tena samayena jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijño nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
S04n482:3: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān priyadarśane kalpe vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau |
S04n482:4: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasya pravacane śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt |
S04n482:5: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya vimaladattā nāma bhāryābhūt |
S04n482:6: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya dvau putrāvabhūtām-eko vimalagarbho nāma,
S04n482:9: prajñāvantau ca puṇyavantau ca jñānavantau ca bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ ca abhiyuktāvabhūtām |
S04n482:11: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmupāyakauśalyapāramitāyāṃ maitryāṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāmupekṣāyāṃ yāvat saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu |
S04n482:19: sa ca bhagavāṃstena kālena tena samayena imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayāmāsa teṣāṃ sattvānāmanukampāyai,
S04n482:21: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārako yena svamātā janayitrī,
S04n482:23: upasaṃkramya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya janayitrīmetadavocatām ehyamba gamiṣyāvastasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśam taṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya |
S04n482:25: eṣa hyamba sa bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ visteraṇa saṃprakāśayati,
S04n482:27: evamukte kulaputrā vimaladattā rājabhāryā vimalagarbhaṃ dārakaṃ vimalanetraṃ ca dārakametadavocat-eṣa khalu kulaputrau yuvayoḥ pitā rājā śubhavyūho brāhmaṇeṣvabhiprasannaḥ |
S04n482:29: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārako daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya tāṃ svamātaraṃ janayitrīmetadavocatām-mithyādṛṣṭikule'sminnāvāṃ jātau?
S04n482:31: atha khalu kulaputrā vimaladattā rājabhāryā tau dvau dārakāvetadavocat-sādhu sādhu kulaputrau |
S04n482:32: yuvāṃ tasya svapitū rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai kiṃcideva prātihāryaṃ saṃdarśayatam |
S04n482:34: prasannacittaśca asmākamanujānīyāt tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhigantum ||
S04n482:35: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārakastasyāṃ velāyāṃ saptatālamātraṃ vaihāyasamabhyudgamya tasya pitū rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai buddhānujñātāni yamakāni prātihāryāṇyakurutām |
S04n482:43: tau tasminnevākāśe mahāntau bhūtvā khuḍḍakau bhavataḥ,
S04n482:48: iyadbhiḥ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā ṛddhiprātihāryaistābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ sa śubhavyūho rājā svapitā vinītaḥ |
S04n482:49: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastayordārakayostamṛddhiprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya tau dārakāvetadavocat-ko yuvayoḥ kulaputrau śāstā,
S04n482:51: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakau taṃ rājānaṃ śubhavyūhametadavocat-eṣa sa mahārāja bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati ratnamaye bodhivṛkṣamūle dharmāsanopaviṣṭaḥ |
S04n482:52: sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati |
S04n482:55: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastau dārakāvetadavocat-paśyāmo vayaṃ kulaputrau taṃ yuvayoḥ śāstāram |
S04n482:57: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakau tato'ntarīkṣādavatīrya yena svamātā janayitrī tenopasaṃkrāmatām |
S04n482:58: upasaṃkramya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya svamātaraṃ janayitrīmetadavocatām-eṣa āvābhyāmamba vinītaḥ svapitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n482:61: āvāṃ tasya bhagavataḥ sakāśe pravrajiṣyāva iti ||
S04n482:62: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārakastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svamātaraṃ janayitrīṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣatām-
S04n482:64: āvāṃ vai pravrajiṣyāvo durlabho hi tathāgataḥ ||1 ||
S04n482:69: vayaṃ pi pravrajiṣyāmo durlabho hi tathāgataḥ ||3 || iti ||
S04n482:70: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakāvime gāthe bhāṣitvā tau mātāpitarāvetadavocatām-sādhu amba tāta eta |
S04n482:71: vayaṃ sarve sahitā bhūtvā gamiṣyāmastasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśam |
S04n482:72: upasaṃkramiṣyāmastaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya |
S04n482:77: tasmāttarhi amba tāta paramapuṇyopastabdhā vayamīdṛśe pravacane upapannāḥ |
S04n482:80: tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśe pravrajiṣyāvaḥ |
S04n482:81: durlabhaṃ hi amba tāta tathāgatānāṃ darśanam |
S04n482:85: tena khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ samayena tasya rājñaḥ śūbhavyūhasya antaḥpurāccaturaśītirantaḥpurikāsahasrāṇi asya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya bhājanabhutānyabhūvan |
S04n482:87: vimalagarbhaśca dārako bahukalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvasattvapāpajahane samādhau carito'bhūt kimiti sarvasattvāḥ sarvapāpaṃ jaheyuriti |
S04n482:88: sā ca tayordārakayormātā vimaladattā rājabhāryā sarvabuddhasaṃgītiṃ sarvabuddhadharmaguhyasthānāni ca saṃjānīte sma |
S04n482:89: atha khalu kulaputrā rājā śubhavyūhastābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ tathāgataśāsane vinītaḥ,
S04n482:92: sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā sarvasvajanaparivārā tau ca dvau dārakau rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrau dvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sāntapurau sāmātyau sarve sahitāḥ samagrāḥ yena bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S04n482:94: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantaṃ triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthuḥ ||
S04n482:95: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājānaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ saparivāramupasaṃkrāntaṃ viditvā dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati |
S04n482:96: atha khalu kulaputrā rājā śubhavyūhastena bhagavatā dhārmyā kathayā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ kanīyaso bhrātuḥ paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājye pratiṣṭhāpya saputrasvajanaparivāraḥ,
S04n482:98: tau ca dvau dārakau sārdhaṃ tairdvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ,
S04n482:99: sarve sahitāḥ samagrāstasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ |
S04n482:100: pravrajitvā ca rājā śubhavyūhaḥ saparivāraścaturaśītivarṣasahasrāṇyabhiyukto vijahāra imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ cintayan bhāvayan paryavadāpayan |
S04n482:101: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhasteṣāṃ caturaśītīnāṃ varṣasahasrāṇāmatyayena sarvaguṇālaṃkāravyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sma |
S04n482:104: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājāḥ śubhavyūho gaganatale sthitastaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat-imau bhagavan mama putrau śāstārau bhavataḥ |
S04n482:109: kalyāṇamitrau bhagavan mama tau dvau dārakau putrarūpeṇa mama gṛha upapannau,
S04n482:113: avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ hi mahārāja kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarveṣu bhavagaticyutyupapattyāyataneṣūpapannānāṃ sulabhāni bhavanti kalyāṇamitrāṇi,
S04n482:117: paśyasi tvaṃ mahārāja etau dvau dārakau?
S04n482:120: bhagavānāha-etau khalu punarmahārāja kulaputrau pañcaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike pūjāṃ kariṣyataḥ,
S04n482:121: imaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyataḥ sattvānāmanukampāyai,
S04n482:123: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastato gaganatalādavatīrya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya taṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat-tatsādhu bhagavan |
S04n482:124: nirdiśatu tathāgataḥ-kīdṛśena jñānena samanvāgatastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yena mūrdhni uṣṇīṣo vibhāti,
S04n482:127: sā ca samasahitā dantāvalī vadanāntare virājati,
S04n482:129: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rāja śubhavyūha iyadbhirguṇaistaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhiṣṭutya anyaiśca guṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraistaṃ bhagavantamabhiṣṭutya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitabhoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvanmahārthamidaṃ tathāgataśāsanam,
S04n482:132: adyāgreṇa vayaṃ bhagavanna bhūyaścittasya vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ,
S04n482:135: na bhūyaḥ pāpakānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ |
S04n482:136: ebhirahaṃ bhagavan iyadbhirakuśalaidharmaiḥ samanvāgato necchāmi bhagavato'ntikamupasaṃkramitum |
S04n482:137: sa tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrajasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya antarīkṣagata evāsthāt ||
S04n482:138: atha khalu sa rājā śubhavyūhaḥ sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ bhagavata uparyantarīkṣe'kṣaipsīt |
S04n482:139: samanantarakṣiptaśca sa muktāhārastasya bhagavato mūrdhni muktāhāraḥ kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito'bhūccaturasraścatuḥsthūṇaḥ samabhāgaḥ suvibhakto darśanīyaḥ |
S04n482:141: tasmiṃśca paryaṅke tathāgatavigrahaḥ paryaṅkabaddhaṃ saṃdṛśyate sma |
S04n482:144: yatra hi nāma ayaṃ tathāgatavigrahaḥ kūṭāgāramadhyagataḥ saṃdṛśyate prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataḥ ||
S04n482:145: atha khalu bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgataścatasraḥ parṣadaḥ āmantrayate sma-paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ rājānaṃ gaganatalasthaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nadantam?
S04n482:147: bhagavānāha-eṣa khalu bhikṣavaḥ śubhavyūho rājā mama śāsane bhikṣubhāvaṃ kṛtvā śālendrarājo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati,
S04n482:148: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vistīrṇavatyāṃ lokadhātau |
S04n482:150: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ śālendrarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aprameyo bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
S04n482:152: samā pāṇitalajātā ca vaidūryamayī sā vistīrṇavatī lokadhāturbhaviṣyati |
S04n482:154: syāt khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā-anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt?
S04n482:155: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam |
S04n482:157: ayameva sa padmaśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhut |
S04n482:158: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā-anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma rājabhāryābhūt?
S04n482:159: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam |
S04n482:161: ayaṃ sa vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitadhvajarājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma rājabhāryābhut |
S04n482:162: tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya bhāryātvamabhyupagato'bhūt |
S04n482:163: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā-anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau dārakāvabhūtām?
S04n482:164: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam |
S04n482:166: imau tau bhaiṣajyarājaśca bhaiṣajyasamundataśca tena kālena tena samayena tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrāvabhūtām |
S04n482:167: evamacintyaguṇasamanvāgatau kulaputrā bhaiṣajyarājo bhaiṣajyasamudgataśca bodhisattvau mahāsattvau,
S04n482:170: te sarve namaskaraṇīyā bhaviṣyanti sadevakena lokena ||
S04n482:171: asmin khalu punaḥ pūrvayogaparivarte bhāṣyamāṇe caturaśītīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham ||
S04n482:172: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye śubhavyūharājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma pañcaviṃśatimaḥ ||
